summary: A mixin that equips Whisper models with comprehensive generation capabilities, handling input preparation, language and task configuration, segment management, token timestamp extraction, post‑processing, and fallback strategies to produce accurate transcriptions from audio.
business_intent: Allow developers to embed robust speech‑to‑text functionality into their products, delivering multilingual transcription with timestamps, confidence metrics, and automatic handling of edge cases such as no‑speech detection or generation failures.
